original_text: Then Samuel took Saul and his servant into the room where they would eat the meal. He made them sit in the most important seats in front of all the other people. About 30 people had come to eat the meal.
korean_text: 사무엘이 사울과 그의 사환을 인도하여 객실로 들어가서 청한 자 중 상석에 앉게 하였는데 객은 삼십 명 가량이었더라

sentences.original_text: Then Samuel took Saul and his servant
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사무엘이 사울과 그의 종을 데리고

sentences.original_text: where they would eat the meal
in front of all the other people
had come to eat the meal
